title: World Orchestra Week at Carnegie Hall
description: This week marks the beginning of World Orchestra Week at Carnegie Hall! Discover talent from around the globe as passionate young musicians perform with leading conductors and soloists. Today only, get $20 tickets to select concerts using promo code SKN50662. Purchase online, over the phone (212-247-7800), or at the Box Office on 57th and Seventh (11 AM â€“ 6 PM).
